name: Face Your Fear
description:
Face Your Fear is a horror game based on a story with puzzles and a realistic and stressful atmosphere. You can’t fight so you have to run, hide or look death in the eyes.In Face Your Fear,you incarnate a young teenager attaint of a heart disease, so you will have to pay attention to your BPM and do not forget to take your medicines.

  • Solve the puzzles as fast as possible, but do not suffer from too much stress it would be deadly...

  • Alone at home while your parents are gone, you find yourself seeing paranormal events and everything seems to have changed?..

  • All windows are blocked and unbreakable.. The phone no longer works.. You're alone in this hell, will you fight for your survival?

  • The game is currently in pre-alpha phase. If you encounter any issues or bugs, please report them to us on our Discord server. Your feedback is crucial to improving the game. Thank you very much!

  • In Face Your Fear there will be different levels, with different monsters and mechanics. Try to get out of this hell.

  • Immersive graphics, detailed map and stressful atmosphere.
